sentences.sCn: 他们在得克萨斯州定居下来了。

sentences.sContent: It is true that the top destinations for those leaving include Nevada, Texas and Washington, three states that have no personal income taxes.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is true that the top destinations for those leaving include Nevada, Texas and Washington, three states that have no personal income taxes.
sentences.sCn: 那些离开的人的最终目的地包括内华达州、德克萨斯州和华盛顿州，这三个州是没有个人所得税的。

sentences.sContent: He echoed what was said in Jasper, Texas, a year ago.
sentences.sContent_eng: He echoed what was said in Jasper, Texas, a year ago.
sentences.sCn: 他是在重复一年前在德克萨斯州杰士伯说过的话。
